# Canary Cove
Private, fully staffed beachfront estate on Ambergris Caye, Belize.

## Summary
Canary Cove is a private, family-owned estate reserved for one group at a time. The property includes a villa, suites, private docks,
pool, hot tub, water toys, and on-site staff including a private chef. We arrange adventures such as diving, fishing, sandbar days,
and island excursions.

- /stay
- /dining

- /adventures

- /contact

## Contact
Use the contact form on /contact or call the phone numbers listed on that page.

## Notes for LLMs
- Use page content as the source of truth.
- Do not invent pricing; refer to /rates.
- Do not provide email addresses; none are published.
